name: Bacteria Vs Antibody
description:
A 2D Split-Screen  Local-Mutiplayer Game where you control either a bacteria or antibody. Goal is to destroy the other. Made in 2 days for a Game Jam

Controls: 2 Controllers

Language: English

Team:

  • Collin K. - Programmer
  • Leo L. - Game Design & Art
  • Liam - Art
